311819.「私たちは この先で 大きな町を見つけたの。\n だけど 取りつく島もなく\n:
We found a big town down the road. But we were
turned away by the soldiers who guarded the
gate with no way out...

311820.「仕方なく ここまで\n 戻ってきたところだったのよ。\n ねっ ジーガンフさん:
I had no choice. I just got back here. Hey,
Mr. Jiganf?

311822.「この地方は 創生のチカラが\n 薄いんだなって 思ってたけど……\n このあた:
I used to think that the power of creation was
weak in this region, but... things are getting
a little stronger around here!

311823.「そうせいの……チカラ？\n 初めて聞く 言葉だわ。\n よければ どんなものか:
The... power... of... creation? I've never
heard that word before. If you don't mind,
could you tell me what it is?

311824.「あっ うん。えっとね……\n 創生のチカラは すべてを創りだし\n すべてを存:
Ah, yes. The power of creation is the power to
create everything and bring everything into
existence.

311825.「土も水も ヒトも動物も この世に存在する\n すべてのモノは 創生のチカラを:
Soil, water, humans, animals, everything that exists in this world has the power of creation. I'm just following what my master
taught me.

311826.「うーん。\n 万物に宿る 生命のエネルギー……\n といったところかしら？:
Hmmm. The energy of life that resides in all
things...something like that?

311827.「それで あなたは\n 創生のチカラを 感じ取ることができるの？: So you can sense the power of creation?

311829.「すごい……すごいわ ポルテちゃん！\n お花を 咲かせるチカラといい\n あな:
You're amazing...amazing, Porte! You're an
amazing girl, aren't you, with your ability to
make flowers bloom?

311830.「そ そうかなあ……？\n えへへ。: I wonder if that's so...? Heh heh.

311832.「ええ もちろん！\n ポルテちゃんは 仲間ですもの。: Yes, of course! Porte-chan is a companion.

311834.「まあ そうなの？\n さすがは ランガーオ村の武闘チャンピオンね！:
Oh, really? You are indeed the martial arts
champion of Langao Village!

311837.「……そうね。そうしたいけれど まずは\n 町に入れてもらう方法……つまり 門番:
Well...yes. I'd like to, but first I have to
find a way to get into town... that is, find a
way to get the gatekeeper to trust me.

311838.「とりあえず 今日のところは\n ここで 野営にしない？:
In the meantime, why don't we camp here for
the day?

311840.「さっ そうと決まれば さっそく準備しなきゃ！\n <pc>にも 手伝ってもらい:
Well, I'll have to get ready as soon as I
decide to do so! I want <pc> to help
me, so please talk to me later.

311841.「ね <pc>。\n メレアーデさんって 王女さまなのに\n すっごく 話しやす:
Mereade is a princess, but she is very easy to
talk to and a nice person!

311842.「でも……ジーガンフさんは\n ちょっと 怖い感じのヒトなのかな？\n メレアー:
But...Jiganf seems to be a bit scary, and
Mereade seemed to be in trouble...

311844.川辺の休憩所に戻ってきた <cs_pchero>は\nメレアーデに まがまがしい:
Returning to the Riverside Rest Area,
<cs_pchero> gave Mereade the Ominous
Mushroom.

311845.「近くで見ると いかにも 毒がありそうな\n 見た目を しているわね！？ ごめん:
Up close, it looks very poisonous, doesn't it?
I'm sorry. I don't think I should eat this...

311847.「まあ ジーガンフさんは\n このキノコを 食べたことがあるのね。:
Well, Jiganf, you have eaten these mushrooms
before.

311851.<cs_pchero>たちは ジーガンフが 見事な手際で\n作った おいしいスー:
<cs_pchero> and the others filled their
bellies with the delicious soup that Jiganf
had so skillfully prepared! And then...

311852.「ありがとう ジーガンフさん。釣りざおの用意も\n お魚をさばくのも スープ作り:
Thank you Jiganf. I've been using you to
prepare the fishing rods, catch the fish, make
the soup... everything.

311853.「そうそう！\n ジーガンフさんって 意外と やさしいんだね。\n もっと 怖い:
Oh, yes! Jiganf is surprisingly kind. I
thought he was more scary!

311855.「マイユさんって もしかして……\n ジーガンフさんの恋人……とか！？: Could it be that Maille is a lover of Jiganf?

311859.それから ジーガンフは話した。\nランガーオ村に生まれ 幼なじみの マイユと\n:
Then Jiganf told how he was born in Langao
Village and grew up with his childhood friends
Maille and Arold.

311860.村でいちばん強い男が マイユと結婚できること。\nしかし ある年の 武闘大会で\:
The strongest man in the village could marry
Maille. However, one year, Arold was the
winner in the fighting tournament.

311861.その くやしさに つけ込まれて\n伝説の悪鬼 ゾンガロンに操られ\n暴走してしま:
The legendary demon Zongalon took advantage of
his frustration to manipulate him into running
amok...

311865.「なんて ロマンティックな話……あっ！\n ジーガンフさんにとっては\n つらい: What a romantic tick story...oh! I'm sorry...

311867.「うん！\n あたしも メレちーも\n ジーくんの話 感動しちゃった！:
Yes, I know! Me and Melechi were both moved by
Zee's story!

311869.「メレちーも そう思うわ。\n 話してくれて ありがとう！ ジーくん！:
Melechi thinks so too. Thanks for talking to
me! Zee-kun!

311878.「そうなんだあ……。\n みんな それぞれ 事情があるんだね。: I see... Everyone has their own circumstances.

311879.「きゃっ！\n ど……どうしたの ふたりとも！？: What's wrong? What's wrong with both of you?

311881.「先日 我が国を訪れたのは 貴殿だな。\n フーラズーラには 見えないが……\n:
It was you who visited our country the other day, and while you don't look like Hula Zula, it is also true that you don't look like a
human being.

311882.「あのっ！ もしや あなた方の国には\n 人間しかいないのでは！？ 彼は……ジー:
You know what? If only there were HUMANS in
your country! He...Zee-kun is a races called
Ogre, not a MONSTER!

311883.「悪いが 言葉は 信じられぬ。\n 貴殿らの正体……\n 我が槍にて 確かめさせ:
I'm sorry, but I don't believe a word. Let me
confirm your true identity with my spear.

311884.「非礼を お詫びしよう 異国からの客人よ。\n 我が名は イルシーム。\n アマ:
I apologize for my rudeness, my foreign guest.
My name is Ilseem, warrior of the Kingdom of
Amarak.

311885.「私たちを 信じてくださるのですか？\n 魔物や 怪しい者ではないと……。:
Do you believe us that we are not monsters or
shady characters?

311886.「ああ。すまなかった お嬢さん。\n 我らのような男にとっては 矛を交えて語るの:
Oh. I'm sorry, miss. For men like us, it's
always quickest to speak in contradiction.

311888.「あたしは ポルテ！\n こっちの お嬢さんは メレちーだよ。\n そして 我ら:
I'm Porte, and this young lady over here is
Merechi. And our Captain <cs_pchero>!

311890.「あっ えっと……\n よろしくお願いします。: Oh, um...please take care of it.

311891.「それで お前たちは どこから来たのだ？\n オーガ……などという言葉は 初めて:
So where do you guys come from, I've never
heard of Ogre...or any other races other than
human.

311892.「ええと 私たちは……とても 遠い場所から\n この地の調査に やってきました。:
Well, we've come from a very long way to
investigate this place.

311893.「私たちの住む地では オーガだけでなく\n さまざまな種族が 共存しているのです:
In our land, not only ogres but also various
races coexist.

311894.「そうなのか……。俺もそうだが\n ほとんどの者は 国から出たことがない。\n:
I see... Most of us, myself included, have
never been out of the country. I apologize
again for my ignorance.

311895.「そして……異国からの客人よ。\n もし よければ お前たちを招待させてほしい。:
And now... our guests from another land. If
you will allow me to invite you. Come to my
homeland, Amarak Kingdom.

311897.「ゆえあって 俺は ひとあし先に\n アマラークに 戻らせてもらうが……国の者に:
Therefore, I'm going back to Amarak, but I'll
tell my countrymen about you and the races.

311898.「だが……もし 我が国の者が\n お前たちの姿を見て 驚いても\n 許してはくれ:
But... would you forgive us if we were
surprised to see you in our country? No
offense intended.

311900.「感謝する。\n では アマラーク王国で会おう。: Thank you. See you in Amarak Kingdom.

311901.「これで 町に入れてもらえそうだね！\n ふわ……安心したら\n なんだか 眠く:
I guess they'll let me into town now! I feel
so relieved that I'm starting to get sleepy.

311902.「もう 遅い時間だものね。\n 今夜は眠って 明日に備えましょう。:
It's already late. Let's sleep tonight and get
ready for tomorrow.

311903.<cs_pchero>たちは そのまま\n川辺の休憩所で 身体を休めた……。\n:
<cs_pchero> and the others rested in the
Riverside Rest Area... And dawn broke!<me 64>

311904.「おはよう <cs_pchero>！\n さあ 出発しましょう。アマラーク王国は:
Good morning <cs_pchero>! Let's get going,
Amarak Kingdom is just beyond Turbia Meadows.

311905.「アマラーク王国へ ようこそ！\n 事情は イルシーム卿より 伺っています。\n:
Welcome to Amarak Kingdom! We have heard from
Lord Ilseem. I am very sorry about the other
day.

311906.「イルシーム卿でしたら\n 城に いらっしゃるはずです。\n 場所は…………:
If you are Lord Ilseem, you will find him at
the castle. The place is...

311911.「待って！\n 行ってはダメです！\n やつは……フーラズーラは……！: Wait! Don't go! He... Hula Zula..!

311916.「待て！\n 食うなら オレを食え！: Wait! If you're gonna eat me, eat me!

311918.「フーラズーラに 普通の攻撃は 効かない！\n しかし ひとりかふたり 人間を食:
Hula Zula is immune to ordinary attacks! But
if one or two humans are eaten, they will be
satisfied and disappear!

311919.「さあ オレを食え！\n 罪なき民に代わり\n この命 よろこんで 捧げよう！:
Come on, eat me! I will gladly offer up my
life on behalf of the innocent people!

311921.「怖いものか！ 怖いものかッ！\n アマラークに 栄光あれ……ッ！:
I'm not afraid! I'm not afraid! Glory to
Amarak...!

311924.「ジーくん！ よかった無事で！\n 兵士さんも！:
Mr. Gee! Thank God you're safe! And the
soldier, too!

311926.「それは この槍……黒槍クバーラトのチカラだ。\n 黒槍は フーラズーラに効く\:
It is the power of this spear, the Black Spear of Kubarat. The Black Spear is the one and only weapon in the world that works on Hula
Zula.

311927.「イルシーム卿は この国で 並ぶ者なき戦士！\n ゆえに 王から 国宝である\n:
Sir Ilseem is a warrior without equal in the
land! That is why the king has given him the
Black Spear, a national treasure.

311928.「ただし フーラズーラは 倒したところで\n いくらでも わいて出て……突如\n:
However, Hula Zula, even when defeated, will
come out of nowhere and suddenly appear in the
town without a sound, eating human beings.

311929.「この国は はるか 祖先の代から\n フーラズーラの脅威に 悩まされているのだ。:
This country has been plagued by the threat of
Hula Zula since the days of our forefathers.

311930.「そんな 恐ろしいものが 存在するなんて……。:
I never thought such a horrible thing could
exist...

311931.「この国は 危険だ。\n 故郷へ戻るなら 止めはしない。:
This country is dangerous. I won't stop you if
you go back home.

311932.「しかし……もし まだ お前たちが\n この国の調査を望むなら 王に紹介してやろ:
But...if you still wish to explore this
country, I will introduce you to the King, and
you can come to Amarak Castle.

311934.「えと……行くよね？ アマラーク城。: Um... we're going, right? Amarak Castle.

311937.「……では 町に出現した フーラズーラは\n イルシーム卿が 撃退し\n 犠牲者:
So the Hula Zula that appeared in town was
repelled by Lord Ilseem and no casualties were
reported?

311938.「はっ！ フーラズーラに食われかけた 私を\n 駆けつけた卿が 救ってくださいま: Haha! I was almost eaten by Hula Zula!

311939.「あっ……しかしながら リズク王！\n イルシーム卿には 感謝しておりますが\n:
But, King Rizk, thanks to Lord Ilseem, I have
no fear of death.

311940.「アマラークのために 命捧げるは 誇り。\n 先に旅立った 同胞や祖先も よろこ:
I am proud to give my life for Amarak. My fellow countrymen and ancestors who have departed before me will gladly welcome my
soul.

311941.「……うむ。そなたらの覚悟こそ\n アマラークの至宝である。:
Mm-hmm. Your determination is the treasure of
Amarak.

311942.「王よ。彼らが 先刻\n ご報告申し上げた 者たちです。:
O king. These are the men I have just reported
to you.

311943.「ようこそ はるか 異国からの客人よ。\n 我が名は リズク。\n このアマラー:
Welcome, my guests from faraway lands. My name
is Rizk, king of Amarak.

311944.「しかし 客人よ。そなたらも 見たであろう？\n フーラズーラという 正体不明の:
But my guest. You have seen the unidentified
horror that is Hula Zula. The sooner you leave
this country, the better.

311946.「<pc>。\n この国には 調査のために来たけど……\n 困っている人を 見殺:
<pc>. I came to this country to do
some research... but I can't just leave people
in need.

311947.「陛下。この国の窮状を 見たからこそ\n 帰るわけには まいりません。:
Your Majesty. I cannot leave now that I have
seen the plight of this country.

311948.「ジーガンフの言うように フーラズーラを\n 倒せるかは わかりませんが……アマ:
I don't know if we can defeat Hula Zula as
Jiganf suggests, but we can help save Amarak.

311949.「……異国からの客人よ。\n そなたらの申し出に 心から 感謝する。:
My guest from another land. I thank you from
the bottom of my heart for your offer.

311950.「滞在中は この城の客間を 自由に使うといい。\n 客間は １階にある。\n ま:
During your stay, you are free to use the
castle's parlor, which is located on the first
floor. You can rest there first.

311952.「さあ <pc>。\n お言葉に甘えて 客間に行きましょう。:
Come on <pc>. With all due respect,
let's go to the PARLOR.

311954.「おつかれさま <pc>！\n 私たちも サンプルを 集め終わっているわ。\n:
Good night <pc>! We're finishing
getting our samples too. Let's wait for Mr.
Dura at Amarak.

311957.「イルシームさんは ほとんど休まずに\n フーラズーラの襲撃に 備えてるって聞い:
I heard that Mr. Ilseem is preparing for Hula
Zula's attack with almost no rest. He doesn't
drink at all.

311958.「お前たちが思うほど\n 禁欲的な生活を しているわけでもないさ。\n 酒はやら:
I don't lead as ascetic a life as you might
think. I don't drink, but I do enjoy sweets.

311959.「けれど 今だって\n 槍の鍛錬を されていたのでしょう？\n この国や……リズ:
But you are still training your spear, aren't
you? To protect this country and King Rizk.

311960.「…………ああ。\n 大恩ある先王に 報いねばならんからな……。:
Yes. I must repay the great debt I owe my
predecessor...

311961.「最近 このあたりに出没する\n 少年山賊というのは お前だね？\n シュタール:
Are you one of the boy bandits that have been
popping up around here lately, or are you a
member of the Stahl bandit gang?

311965.「ガキぃ？\n それは 名前じゃないだろう？: Kid? That's not your name, is it?

311966.「でも ほかの連中は\n おれのことを そう呼ぶ。昔から。:
But the others call me that. From the
beginning.

311968.「腹が減っているだろう？\n 私と 一緒に おいで。\n 飯を食わせてやる。:
You must be hungry. Come with me. I'll feed
you.

311970.「子は 国の宝。\n お前は 国の長たる私の 宝だから。:
The child is the treasure of the nation. You
are the treasure of me, the head of the
nation.

311972.「さあ 行こう。\n アマラークに戻ったら\n お前の名を 考えねばならないな。:
Let's go. I'll have to think of your name when
we get back to Amarak.

311973.「……まあ。\n まずは 風呂に入ってもらおうかな。:
Well...well. I think I'll have her take a bath
first.

311974.「女王は 俺に 名をくれた。教育をくれた。\n 兵士という役目を 生きる場所をく:
The Queen gave me a name. She gave me an education. She gave me a place to live, a role as a soldier, and when Rizk was born, she
asked me to be his brother.

311975.「すてきな方……。でも 私たちは\n 先王陛下を お見かけしたことがありません。:
He is a lovely man... But we have never seen
His Majesty the First. You don't mean...?

311976.「女王は フーラズーラに食われた。\n リズクをかばって……幼いリズクの目の前で:
The queen was eaten by Hula Zula, defending
Rizk...right in front of young Rizk.

311977.「当時は 上級士官以上の兵士が 持ち回りで\n 黒槍を持って 巡回をおこなってい:
At that time, soldiers above the rank of senior officer took turns patrolling with a black spear. I was only a graduate and was in
training at the castle...

311978.「……だから イルシームさんは\n 国いちばんの 戦士になったんだね。\n 黒槍:
...That's why Ilseem became the best warrior
in the country. To protect Rizk with the Black
Spear...

311979.「まあ リズクには 自分や城より\n 町を中心に警備しろと 命じられているがな。:
Well, Rizk is ordered to guard the town rather
than himself or the castle.

311982.「あっ そーだ イルシームさん！\n これから あたしたちの仲間の 学者さんが\:
Oh, that's right, Ilseem! The scholars from
our companion are coming to Amarak Castle.

311983.「黒槍を見せたいから\n イルシームさんも 一緒に来てくれる？:
I want to show you the Black Spear, so will
you come with me, Ilseem?

311984.「承知した。\n では 城へ行こう。: Yes, sir. Then let's go to the castle.

311986.「……今の話 信じるのか？: You believe what I just said?

311987.「ふむ……万物に宿る エネルギーか。\n たしかに ある流派の武術にも\n 似た:
Hmmm...energy that resides in all things. It
is true that there is a similar teaching in
certain schools of martial arts.

311989.「それで……これから どうする？\n 門番には 追い返されたが\n もう一度 あ:
So... what now? The gatekeeper turned you
away, but now you're going back to that town?

311990.「そうか。\n では オレは 薪でも用意してこよう。: I see. Well, I'll go get some firewood.

311991.「薪の準備が できたぞ……ん？\n お前が持っているのは マガマガタケだな。\n:
Firewood is ready... hmm? That's a mallard
mushroom you're holding. It's poisonous, but a
good mushroom if you treat it.

311992.「修行で よく山に こもっていたからな。\n 食事や料理も 修行の一環だ。……こ:
I used to spend a lot of time in the mountains for ascetic training. Eating and cooking are part of my training. I didn't realize that
there are things like Astoltia in this world.

311993.「こいつと魚で スープを作るなら 先に\n マガマガタケの下処理を 済ませたほう:
If you are going to make a soup with this and fish, it is better to prepare the mallard mushrooms first. When the pot comes to a boil,
add the Antidotal Herb...

311994.「……オレが 作るか？: You want me to make it?

311995.「ああ……怖がらせていたのなら すまなかった。\n どうも オレは クチ下手でな:
Oh I'm sorry if I scared you. I'm not very
good with mouths...even Maille used to laugh
at me.

311996.「いや オレたちは ただの幼なじみだ。\n マイユと 一緒になったのは 別の男で:
No, we're just childhood friends, and Maille
ended up with another guy... well, let's not
talk about me.

311997.「そんなオレを 止めてくれたのが\n 村を訪れていた <cs_pchero>だ。:
It was <cs_pchero> who stopped me when I
was visiting the village. I'm glad you took
care of me back then.

311998.「だが 勇者覚醒の証……世界中を照らした\n 白い光で ゾンガロンは ふたたび封:
But with the white light that illuminated the
world, Zongalon was sealed once again and I
regained my sanity.

311999.「そして オレは 真の勝者であるアロルドと\n やつの花嫁の マイユが\n 村か:
And I watched the real winner, Arold, and his
bride, Maille, leave the village.

312000.「つらいと言うより 情けない話だな。\n まあ……お前たちには\n 楽しんでもら:
It's more pathetic than painful. Well...I'm
glad you guys had a good time.

312006.「……その後 オレは ゾンガロンを倒すべく\n 修行の旅に出たんだが……その間に:
After that I went on a training trip to defeat
Zongalon, but in the meantime he had been
defeated by <cs_pchero>.

312007.「ああ……文句を 言いたいわけじゃないんだ。\n 間に合わなかったオレが 悪いだ:
Oh, I don't mean to complain. It's just my
fault for not getting there in time.

312008.「しかし 己の武を懸ける 目的を失って\n この先 自分は 何をすべきか……\n:
However, having lost the purpose for which I had put my military might on the line, I was wondering what I should do in the future...
when I heard about the survey team.

312009.「ゾンガロンを倒すための修行で 鍛えあげた\n この拳にふさわしい 強敵との出会:
An encounter with a formidable foe worthy of
the fists I have forged in training to defeat
Zongalon. That's what I want for this journey.

312010.「ハッ……さっそく\n オレの望みが かなうかもしれん。: Ha...maybe I'll get my wish right away.

312011.「まったくだな。\n オレの名は ジーガンフだ。\n また 手合わせしてくれ。:
That's for sure. My name is Jiganf. Let's get
together again.

312012.「気にするな。\n オレだって お前たちと同じ立場で\n オーガ以外の種族を見た:
Don't worry about it. I'd be surprised if I
saw any races other than Ogre in the same
position as you.

312014.「なんだと！？\n ならば……これは どうだああッ！: What the hell? Then... how about this... ah!

312015.「くっ……なんなんだ こいつは！\n このオレの拳が まったく効かないだと！？:
Damn...what is this guy? My fists don't work
at all?

312017.「おい 何を言っている！？\n 食えって まさか……！: What are you talking about? Eat it. No way..!

312018.「おい ふざけるな！\n オレは 頼んでないぞ！:
Hey, stop messing around! I didn't ask for
this!

312020.「あの化け物は いったい なんなんだ？\n オレの拳は 効かなかったのに\n な:
What the hell is that thing? My fists didn't
work, so why does yours work?

312021.「このオレが 手も足も 出ないだと……？\n あの修行の日々は 無意味だったとい:
I'm out of my depth...? All those days of
training were for nothing!

312023.「悪いが そのつもりはない。\n やつを この手で ぶちのめすまでは 帰れん！:
I'm sorry, but I have no intention of doing
that. I can't leave until I beat him with my
own hands!

312025.「イルシーム卿と……国王陛下！？\n いったい どうされたのですか？:
Sir Ilseem and His Majesty the King! What is
going on?

312026.「リズクが あらためて お前たちに\n 挨拶したいと 言うのでな。: Rizk wants to greet you all anew.

312027.「ごきげんよう 客人よ。\n この部屋の居心地は いかがですか？\n 不便があれ:
Hello Cheery, my guest. I hope you find this room comfortable. If you have any inconvenience, please let one of the men at
the castle know.

312028.「なんか 王さま……玉座の間で会ったときと\n 雰囲気ちがうね？ イルシームさん:
You seem to be in a different mood than when
we met in the throne room, don't you? And
Ilseem, you call him by his first name.

312029.「俺は先王……リズクの親の代から仕えていてな。\n こいつのことは 赤ん坊のころ:
I've been in the service of the previous king,
Rizk's parents. I've watched him since he was
a baby. I even changed his diaper.

312030.「はは……彼の言うとおり イルシームは\n 私の 兄のような方なんです。城の者の:
He's right, Ilseem is like a brother to me.
Though in front of the castle, we treat each
other as king and subject.

312031.「……イルシームから\n あなた方は 信頼できる人物だと聞き\n ひとりの男とし:
...Ilseem told me that you are reliable people
and as a man I came to thank you.

312032.「<pc>さん。縁もゆかりもない この国と\n 民のため チカラを貸してくださる:
<pc>. Thank you so much for lending
your strength for the sake of this country and
its people, with whom you have no connection.

312033.「ですが ひとつだけ 約束してください。\n この国のために 無理はしないと。\:
But you must promise me one thing. I will not
overreach for the sake of this country. I will
never give my life for this country.

312034.「お前たちも 見ただろう。\n この国の兵士は 死を いとわない……\n むしろ:
You have seen it. Soldiers in this country are
willing to die... in fact, they even consider
it a virtue.

312035.「黒槍以外の攻撃を 受け付けない\n フーラズーラという天敵を 抱えつづけ……\:
Over the years, the soldiers' awareness has changed, as they continue to face their natural enemy, Hula Zula, who will not accept
attacks other than a black spear.

312036.「黒槍を持たぬ 一般の兵士たちに できるのは\n 民の身代わりとなって やつらに:
The only thing the common soldier without a black spear can do is to take the place of his people and be eaten by them. In other words...
death is their pride.

312037.「……王として 彼らの献身は ありがたい。\n むしろ そう思うように\n 過去:
As a king, I appreciate their devotion. In
fact, perhaps it was the kings of the past who
inspired them to think so.

312038.「ですが 私自身は……誰も死なせたくない。\n みずから 命を投げうつことが 誇:
But for myself...I don't want anyone to die. I
don't want anyone to die. I don't want anyone
to be proud to throw their own life away!

312041.「ですから……先ほども言いましたが\n あなた方は けっして\n 無理をしないで:
So...as I said before, please do not overwork
yourselves.

312042.「けれど 不思議ですね <pc>さん。\n あなたなら 私たちを救ってくれるので:
But I wonder <pc>. I think you could
save us... for some reason I can't put my
finger on it.

312043.「ええ。私の 自慢のイトコですから。: Yes. I'm very proud of her.

312044.「あっ そうだわ！ 私たち 黒槍と同じもの……\n レプリカを作れないかって\n:
Oh, that's right! We were just talking about
the possibility of making a replica of the
same thing as the Black Spear.

312045.「私たちの仲間に とても優秀な 学者がいます。\n 彼は今 レストリア平野の先に:
We have a very distinguished scholar in our companion. He is now at the end of Restoria Plains... would you be so kind as to show him
the Black Spear?

312046.「なるほど。黒槍の複製は アマラークの歴史上\n 何度も試され 成功したことはな:
I see. The duplication of the Black Spear has been tried many times in the history of Amarak with no success, but with exotic knowledge and
technology, it may be possible.

312047.「黒槍を お見せすること自体は 構いませんが\n この国から持ち出すことは 許可:
I don't mind showing you the Black Spear, but
I can't allow it to leave the country because
I don't want to risk an attack by Hula Zula.

312048.「申し訳ありませんが その学者の方を\n この国に 連れてきてくださいませんか？:
I am sorry, but could you please bring that
scholar to our country?

312049.「あっ……たしかに おっしゃるとおりです。\n わかりました。\n 仲間を 連れ:
Ah...you are absolutely right. I will bring
companion.

312050.「すまんが 頼む。\n では……俺たちも\n そろそろ 失礼するとしよう。:
I'm sorry, but please. Well then... it's time
for us to leave.

312051.「よしっ！\n それじゃ あたしたちは ドゥラくんを迎えに\n はじまりの地へ:
Okay, then, we're off to the Land of Beginnings to pick up Dura-kun! Well then, we are off to the Land of Beginnings to pick up
Dura-kun!

312053.「大したウデだな。\n お前ほどの 武の持ち主は アストルティア……\n オレた:
You are very good. There are not so many
people in Astoltia, not even in our own land,
who possess such prowess.

312054.「つまり イルシームの武は\n 守るための武……ということか。:
So, Ilseem's martial arts are those to
protect...

312055.「オレの武は……\n つねに オレ自身のための武だ。:
My martial art... is always a martial art for
myself.

312056.「……みなさんに集めてもらった サンプルを\n 検証した結果 鉱石や植物 水など:
...I have verified that the samples you have
collected, such as ores, plants, water, etc.,
are not so different from those of Astoltia.

312057.「たとえば 鉄鉱石などは\n アストルティアのそれと\n 完全に 成分が 一致し:
The composition of the iron ore, for example,
matched that of Astoltia perfectly.

312058.「しかし 黒槍は……まったく 未知の物質で\n 構成されており 現時点での複製は:
However, the Black Spear is composed of a
completely unknown substance that is difficult
to replicate at this time.

312059.「さて どうしたものか……黒槍が 遠方で\n 作成された可能性も 考えられる。\:
Well, what do we do... it is possible that the
Black Spear was created in a distant place.
Should we take a sample from another region?

312061.「ほう。そこまで断言するなら\n 何か対案を 聞かせてもらえ……おや？:
Well...if you're going to be so definitive, what's your counter proposal? If you're going to be so definitive, let's hear some counter-
proposals... oh?

312062.「見慣れぬ顔だな。\n この子供は いったい……？:
I don't recognize this face. What is this
child...?

312063.「こんにちは！\n 私は メレアーデ。\n あなたの お名前は？:
Hello, I'm Mereade! I am Mereade, what is your
name?

312065.「ラキ！ すてきな名前ね。\n ラキは どうして お城にいるの？\n お母さんは:
Raki! What a beautiful name. Where is your
mother?

312066.「ラキに 母は いない。\n いるのは とうさまと……ねえさま。:
Raki doesn't have a mother. She has her father
and...sister.

312067.「……そう。お姉さんが いるのね。\n じつは 私にも 弟が……いるのよ。:
Yes... yes. You have a sister. Actually, I
have a little brother too.

312068.「おまえたちが黒槍と呼ぶ それは……\n ラキのとうさまが 創った。:
That which you call the Black Spear was
created by Raki's father.

312069.「でっ でも 黒槍って 建国前から……\n 少なくとも ３００年前には\n お城:
But the Black Spear has been in the castle
since before the founding of the country... at
least 300 years ago, right?

312070.「ラキ。黒槍について くわしく知りたい。\n お前の父さまと 話をさせてもらえな:
Raki, I want to know more about the Black
Spear. May I speak with your father?

312072.「かわりに 知っていることを おしえる。\n 黒槍は フーラズーラに効く。\n:
Instead, I'll tell you what I know. The black
spear works on Hula Zula. But the black spear
does not work on Hula Zula.

312073.「……ごめんなさい ラキ。\n 私には 少し むずかしいわ。:
I'm sorry Raki, it's a little difficult for
me.

312074.「ハディン採石場の 奥。\n そこで ぜんぶ おしえる。\n 入れるようにしてお:
The back of Hadine Quarry. I'll tell you
everything there. I'll make sure you get in...
come on.

312076.「シュタール鉱野にある 大昔に 閉鎖された\n 採石場だ。フーラズーラが 大量に:
It is a closed quarry in Stahl Minefield,
where Hula Zula has been infesting the area
and causing extensive damage.

312077.「シュタール鉱野……あっ！\n あたしたち そこ 知ってるかも。\n 四角い岩で:
Stahl Minefield..! I think we know that place.
Isn't that the place where the square rocks
are blocked in?

312078.「そのとおり。\n 誤って 人が立ち入らないように\n 入り口を 封鎖してあるの:
That's right. The entrance is sealed to
prevent accidental entry.

312079.「ラキよ。入れるようにするなどと言うが\n そう 簡単には…………:
Raki. You say things like "let them in" but
it's not that easy...

312080.「えっ？ ラキ！\n どこに行ってしまったの！？: Eh? Raki, where have you gone!

312081.「なんとも 得体の知れない子供だ……。\n やつの言うことを 信じるつもりか？:
What a mysterious child... Are you going to
believe him?

312082.「正直 信じていいかは わからない。\n でも……あの子を 放ってはおけないわ！:
I honestly don't know if I can trust him.
But...I can't leave her alone! I want to go to
Hadine Quarry.

312083.「俺からも 頼む。様子を 見てきてくれ。\n 黒槍やフーラズーラについて 何か:
Do me a favor. Go and see what's going on. If
you know anything about the Black Spear or
Hula Zula, I'd like to take a chance.

312085.「私は はじまりの地に 戻ります。\n <pc>隊長たちも お気をつけて。:
I'm going back to the Land of Beginnings.
Take care, Captain <pc>.

312087.「用心しろ メレアーデ。\n 入り口の岩を 砕いたのが\n そいつだってことを:
Beware, Mereade, and don't forget that it was
he who smashed the rocks at the entrance.

312088.「だって……そうしないと\n おまえたちが 採石場に入れないから。:
Because... otherwise you guys wouldn't be able
to get into the quarry.

312091.「まったく……。で？\n わざわざ こんな場所まで 呼び出して\n お前は オレ:
Not at all... So? What do you think you're
going to teach us by calling us all the way
down here?

312092.「ラキは 知ってる。フーラズーラは\n 黒槍自体に 弱いわけじゃない。:
Raki knows; Hula Zula is not vulnerable to the
black spear itself.

312093.「やつらを 傷つけるために\n ほんとうに必要なのは……創生のチカラ。:
What we really need to hurt them is the power
of creation.

312094.「えっと……創生のチカラって\n たしか ポルテちゃんが言っていた\n 万物に宿:
Let's see... the power of creation is the
energy of life that resides in all things, as
Porte-chan said, right?

312095.「そのはずだけど……創生のチカラがあれば\n あの化け物を やっつけられるって\:
I thought so, but... what do you mean you can
kill that monster with your power of creation?

312096.「ラキは 事実を 言っているだけ。\n 黒槍が フーラズーラに効くのは あの槍が:
Raki is just telling the truth. The Black
Spear works on Hula Zula because it has a
strong power of creation.

312097.「黒槍じゃなくても\n 創生のチカラが宿る 攻撃なら\n フーラズーラを 倒せる:
Even if it's not a black spear, an attack with
the power of creation in it can take down Hula
Zula.

312098.「うーん……\n 創生のチカラが宿る 攻撃……？:
Hmmm... an attack where the power of creation
resides...?

312099.<center>ふむ……万物に宿る エネルギーか。\nたしかに ある流派の武術に:
Hmmm...energy that resides in all things. It
is true that there is a similar teaching in
certain schools of martial arts.

312100.「創生のチカラ…… 生命のエネルギー……\n 武術で言う 『気』のようなもの……:
The power of creation... the energy of life...
like chi in the martial arts...

312101.「もしや……気を集中させた 攻撃ならば\n フーラズーラを 倒せるのか？:
What if... a focused attack could defeat Hula
Zula?

312102.「そう。\n おまえなら わかると思っていた。: Yes. I knew you would understand.

312109.「ジーくん すごい……\n フーラズーラを やっつけちゃった……！:
Zee-kun, you are amazing...you have defeated
Hula Zula...!

312110.「創生のチカラを宿す 攻撃……つかんだ！\n これで フーラズーラを倒せる！:
The power of creation is in the attack...I've
got it! Now we can defeat Hula Zula!

312112.「いいか <cs_pchero> こいつは\n お前が倒せ！ 気を集中させるんだ:
Listen <cs_pchero> you take this guy down!
Concentrate your chi. That way your attacks
will work on Hula Zula!

312113.「本来 これを会得するには 修行が必要だが……\n お前なら 今この場で つかめ:
It takes practice to master this, but I'm sure
you can figure it out right here, right now!

312114.「ふう……やったな <cs_pchero>。\n これからは お前も フーラズー:
Whew...you did it <cs_pchero>. From now on,
you too should be able to defeat Hula Zula.

312115.「よかった……。\n 守ってくれて ありがとう ふたりとも！: Thank God... Thank you both for protecting me!

312118.「フーラズーラ……\n 今は そう呼ばれている あいつらは\n 城に住みついた人:
Hula Zula... that's what they're called now...
they've been eating the humans that live in
the castle.

312119.「住みついて すぐには ぜんぶ食べない。\n 少しずつ 食べる。\n やつらが:
They don't eat everything immediately after
settling in. They eat little by little. Only
enough to sustain their lives.

312120.「城を中心に 町が栄えるのを待って……人間が\n いっぱいになったら 一気に 食:
They wait for the town to flourish around the castle, and when it fills up with humans, they devour it in one fell swoop. They've been
doing it over and over since ancient times.

312121.「そんな おそろしいことが……！？\n でも たしかに\n アマラークで聞いた話:
Something so horrible...? But it does match
what I heard in Amarak.

312122.「リズク王の祖先が 城を見つけ 定住した。\n 少しずつ町は発展し 人が増えた。:
King Rizk's ancestors found the castle and settled there. Little by little, the town developed and the population grew. Eventually,
Hula Zula appeared...

312123.「今は ひとりかふたり 人間を食べると\n 満足して消えるって 言ってたよね。:
You said that now, one or two people eat HUMAN
and then they are satisfied and disappear.

312124.「けど……いつかは アマラークの人たち\n 全員を 食べつくしてしまうってこと！:
But...it means that one day they will eat up
all the people in Amarak!

312125.「アマラークは もうずいぶん 大きくなった。\n いつ 滅ぼされても おかしくな:
Amarak has already grown up a lot. It is not
surprising that it will be destroyed anytime
soon.

312126.「ちょっと 待て。\n なぜ お前のような子供が それを知っている？\n 砕かれ:
Wait a minute. How does a kid like you know
that? You and your shattered rock. Who the
hell are you?

312128.「もぉ しつこいっ！\n それに 今度は たくさん……！: Oh, you're persistent! And this time, a lot..!

312129.「何体だろうと 同じこと！\n 行くぞ <cs_pchero>！:
No matter how many bodies it is, it's the same
thing! Let's go <cs_pchero>!

312131.「いけない！\n きっと 今のやつらは アマラークへ向かった。\n あの国を 滅:
No way! I'm sure they're headed to Amarak. To
destroy that country!

312132.「侵攻は いつ 起こっても\n おかしくない状況だった。けれど……きっと\n 今:
The invasion could have happened at any time.
But...surely the current battle was the
catalyst!

312133.「お前は ここに オレたちを呼び\n やつらと戦わせた。すべて\n お前の 仕組:
You brought us here to fight them. You set all
this up, didn't you?

312134.「……おまえたちを 呼んだのは\n フーラズーラが出てくるであろう この場所で\:
I called you here to learn how to fight them
in this place where Hula Zula will appear.

312135.「知識だけで 戦いは できない。\n 実践しないと 身につかない……\n とうさ:
You can't fight a battle with knowledge alone.
You have to put it into practice... that's
what my father said.

312137.「でも それで\n アマラークを滅ぼしては 意味がない。:
But it makes no sense to destroy Amarak with
it.

312138.「ラキは 見てきた。\n ずっと ずっと 見てきた。\n たくさんの国が……人が:
Raki has seen it. All along, all along, I've
been watching. Many countries...people being
eaten.

312140.「おねがい！ アマラークを助けて！\n 言いつけで ラキは 手出しできない。\n:
PLEASE! Help Amarak! Raki can't help him, per
his own orders. But if it's you guys..!

312142.「わかっている。ラキの正体は ともかく\n アマラークの危機を 放ってはおけん。:
I know, I don't care who Raki is, but we can't
let the crisis in Amarak go unchecked. Let's
go <cs_pchero>!

312146.「ラキに こいつらとの戦い方を 教わった！\n オレたちも 加勢する！:
Raki taught me how to fight them! We'll join
you!

312147.「感謝する！\n お前たちは アムル広場へ行ってくれ！: Thank you! You guys go to Amul plaza!

312148.「フーラズーラの数が 多すぎる。\n 俺だけでは 手が回らん！:
There are too many Hula Zulas. I can't handle
it all by myself!

312150.「させるかっ！: I'm not going to let you do it!

312151.「メレアーデ！ ポルテ！\n この子を 頼む！: Mereade! Porte, take care of this girl!

312160.「しゃべった……よな？\n なんだったんだ いったい……。:
He talked... didn't he? What the hell was
that?

312162.「町中のフーラズーラが 一斉に 姿を消してな。\n お前たちが 親玉を倒してくれ:
Hula Zula's been disappearing all over town.
You guys took down the big boss, didn't you?
You did good!

312165.「相棒が 食われちまった……。\n あいつが かばおうとした 子供と一緒に……。:
My partner got eaten... Along with the child
he was trying to protect.

312166.「国のために 命を捧げるのは 怖くない。\n けど 食われても 民を救えないのな:
I am not afraid to give my life for my
country. But if I'm eaten and I can't save my
people... then I've just died for nothing!

312167.「聞け アマラークの戦士たち！\n フーラズーラの倒し方が わかった。\n 黒槍:
Hear me, warriors of Amarak, I know how to
defeat Hula Zula. We can beat them without the
Black Spear!

312168.「コツさえつかめば 誰でも やつらと戦える！\n 戦い方は オレが教えよう。\n:
Anyone can fight them once they get the hang
of it! I will teach you how to fight. Anyone
who wants to learn how to fight, come to me!

312169.「フーラズーラを 倒す方法だと……？\n 何百年も 探しつづけて\n 見つからな:
A way to defeat Hula Zula? Why would a
stranger find something we've been looking for
for hundreds of years and haven't found?

312170.「しっ 信じられるものか……。\n 黒槍なしで やつらと 渡り合うなんて！\n:
I can't believe it... I can't cross over to
them without a black spear! It's impossible..!

312171.「なんだよ……。\n なんで 兵士たちは 何も言わないんだ？\n 戦うのが 仕事:
What the hell... Why aren't the soldiers
saying anything? It's your job to fight!

312172.「知らない……どうでもいい。もう 疲れた……。\n いっそ 食べられて 楽になり:
I don't know...I don't care. I'm tired... I
just want to be eaten and be at ease...

312173.「せっかく ラキから\n 戦い方を 教えてもらったのに……\n みんな すっかり:
After Raki taught us how to fight...everyone's
hearts are completely broken.

312174.「……無理もない。\n このような規模の襲撃は 初めてだ。\n 兵だけでなく 民:
No wonder. I've never seen an attack of this
magnitude. Not only the soldiers, but also the
people have been affected.

312176.「……どうした！\n 誰もいないのか！？\n フーラズーラを倒したくないのか！:
...What's the matter? Is there no one here?
Don't you want to beat Hula Zula?

312177.「私は知りたい。教えてくれ。: I want to know. Tell me.

312179.「ジーガンフ殿。\n フーラズーラとの戦い方を\n どうか 私に 教えてほしい。:
Jiganf sir, please teach me how to fight Hula
Zula.

312180.「この２００年は 耐え忍ぶしかなかった。\n しかし これ以上は もう……\n:
For the last 200 years, we have had to endure.
But no more will I let the people of Amarak
die!

312181.「陛下に続く者は いるか！？:
Is there anyone who will follow in your
footsteps?

312182.「そ……そうだ。\n 陛下にだけ 戦わせてなるものか！\n 俺にも 戦い方を 教:
Yes...yes. I won't let you fight alone! Teach
me how to fight!

312184.「あのっ！ 私にも 教えてくれますか？\n もう 兵士さんに守られるのは……\n:
Hey! Will you tell me too? I don't want to be
protected by the soldiers anymore... and I
don't want to be the only one who gets hurt!

312185.「わたしにも……戦えるかなあ？\n そしたら 今度また あいつらが\n おうちに:
Do you think I can fight? Then, the next time
they come to my house, I'll beat them..!

312186.「……ああ！\n 男も女も 大人も子供も 関係ない！\n 望む者 全員に教える。:
...Oh! It doesn't matter if you're a man or a
woman, an adult or a child! I teach all who
wish. Let's fight together!

312187.「<cs_pchero>。調査の途中で すまないが\n オレは この国に残る。ア:
. I'm sorry to interrupt your investigation, but I'm staying in this country. I'm staying here to teach the people
of Amarak how to fight.

312188.「……今まで 武をみがくこと自体を 目的にして\n 生きてきた。だが この国に来:
I have lived my whole life with the aim of
honing my skills. But in this country I think
I have found a use for it for the first time.

312189.「ジーくん。\n 私も あなたの選択は 正しいと思うわ。\n どうか アマラーク:
Gee, I think you made the right choice. I
think you made the right choice too. Please
protect Amarak.

312190.「メレアーデ……。\n お前とチームを組めて よかった。\n 感謝している。:
Mereade... It's been a pleasure teaming up
with you. Thank you.

312191.「ね <cs_pchero>。\n ジーくん なんか 変わったね。:
Hey <cs_pchero>. Gee, you've changed
somehow, haven't you?

312192.「あなた方のおかげで ２００年にわたる\n 絶望的な戦いに 光明が見えてきた。\:
Thanks to you, a glimmer of light has appeared
in 200 years of desperate struggle. Please
accept my gratitude.

312193.「あなた方のおかげで ２００年にわたる\n 絶望的な戦いに 光明が見えてきた。\:
Thanks to you, 200 years of hopeless battles
have been brought to a bright spot. I thank
you from the bottom of my heart.

312194.「星封の結晶が 青く光ってる……。\n ってことは 星のオーラが 手に入ったんだ:
The Benevogem is glowing blue... That means I
got Benevolessence. We did it <cs_pchero>!

312195.「ひとまず この国の調査は 終了かしら。\n ジーくんは アマラークに残るけど\:
I guess our research in this country is done for now. Zee will stay in Amarak, but I will return to the Land of Beginnings at some
point!

312196.「よかった……。\n ちゃんと 星のオーラを 手に入れたみたい。:
Thank goodness... I'm sure I received
Benevolessence properly.

312197.「言いつけどおり あの者たちを 導けました。\n ラキは あなたの お役に立てま: Was Raki of any use to you? Hey...

312198.この地方の 調査を終えた。\n引きつづき ほかの地方の 調査に向かおう。:
The exploration of this region has been
completed. Continue to explore the remaining
regions.

312199.調査隊を派遣した\n３つの地方 すべてで 調査を終えた。\nはじまりの地へ 戻ろ:
Now that we've completed our survey in all
three of the regions we sent our survey team
to, let's go back to the Land of Beginnings.

317255.「で……出た！\n フーラズーラが 出たぞーっ！: And...here it is! Hula Zula is out!
